name: Cake Slide Star Catch (OUYA version)
description:
A special version created for:
The OUYA Anniversary Game Jam 2020
in commemoration of 7 years of the android based micro-console.

https://itch.io/jam/ouya-anniversary-game-jam-2020

Slide your Cake and Catch those Stars.
Light all the candles to win!

A great idea for a digital playable gift card for someone's special day.

Nyyle - "Cake Slide Star Catch is the most wholesome thing I've seen in a while. Great game"

A non-OUYA version is in the works. 

==================================

Changelog: ver 1.1 - changed title screen to match game version - increased volume of studio splash jingle - ending exit key press isolated to "U" only - delay for key press to start game and skip title screen increased - clock display added leading zeroes - centered cake
